strapiPost.title: Monthly Jazz Jam Returns To Fayetteville
strapiPost.content:
A monthly opportunity for you jazz enthusiasts and lovers is back again at the Roots HQ in Fayetteville. 

  • Jammin’: In an effort to keep jazz alive and well, the Northwest Arkansas Jazz Society has announced the return of their Monthly Jazz Jam! The first gathering is tomorrow, Jan. 13, from 6-9p. The Claudia Burson Trio will perform, and set the tone for the evening, then invite jazz enthusiasts to join in. 
  • Living history: Contributions are appreciated, but the evenings are free. Go participate or just listen to some of NWA’s finest musicians. The Roots HQ is in a historic 1880’s building on the SE corner of the Fayetteville Square. 

For more information, click HERE.
